name: Real Drift X Car Racing
description:
HOTTEST DRIFT GAME OF YEAR 2016

More than 5,000,000 fans worldwide are playing REAL DRIFT X yet today!

CAUTION!

This game can absorb you for many hours, do not forget to take a break every 40 minutes!

THE REAL DRIFT X is the best drift racing simulator on mobile devices. You can easily learn the skills of drifting through the best management assistant ever in our physics.

Be ready to race with high performance cars (turbo or naturally aspirated) and passing tracks at maximum speed at a large angle of drift.

Improve your skills as a drifter and gain a new experience in driving your car seizing its characteristics.

Earn experience and compete achievements with your friends.

●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●

Real simulator DRIFT

- REAL DRIFT X will bring you the unique experience of driving sport cars

- If you love to travel sideways, get ready to be a surrender to this game and have fun

- Squeeze the handbrake to let the car go into a skid

- Paint the sidewalk with tires burning rubber

- Smoke, Smoke, Smoke!!!

●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●●

FEATURES

  • The most realistic 3D drift racing simulation on mobile devices;
  • Different levels of difficulty, from beginner to professional drove;
  • Highly customizable: change the color of the body, the body vinyl, wheels, rims color and lettering tires;
  • Flexible configuration options: increased engine power, add turbo change processing parameters (weight distribution, camber angle and so on), the switching gear ratios;
  • Photo mode to share your cool photos of drift with friends in facebook vkontakte. tweeter and much more;
  • Professional engine sound for every car with turbo whistle and exhaust;
  • The calculation of the angle of drift, the greater the angle the more points;
  • Steep music tracks, dubstep, rock, hard rock, electro.
  • Optimized for Intel x86 mobile devices.
